author: Simon Difford
description: This drink may look fluffy and sweet but it's dry and lightly spiced. Perfect for a sunny afternoon.
name: Coquetail Au Vanille
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum (infused with vanilla)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
